verses.verse: וְהָרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> And the famine כָּבֵ֥ד <WH3515> [was] sore בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the land

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which כִּלּוּ֙ <WH3615> had finished לֶאֱכֹ֣ל <WH398> eating אֶת־ <WH853> הַשֶּׁ֔בֶר <WH7668> the corn אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הֵבִ֖יאוּ <WH935> which they had brought out מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> about אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <WH1> their father שֻׁ֖בוּ <WH7725> unto them Go again שִׁבְרוּ־ <WH7666> buy לָ֥נוּ מְעַט־ <WH4592> us a little אֹֽכֶל׃ <WH400> food

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> spake אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> about יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> And Judah לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> unto him saying הָעֵ֣ד <WH5749> did solemnly הֵעִד֩ <WH5749> protest בָּ֨נוּ הָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> The man לֵאמֹר֙ <WH559> unto us saying לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> Ye shall not see פָנַ֔י <WH6440> my face בִּלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> except אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <WH251> your brother אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <WH854> for

אִם־ <WH518> If יֶשְׁךָ֛ <WH3426> If thou wilt מְשַׁלֵּ֥חַ <WH7971> send אֶת־ <WH853> אָחִ֖ינוּ <WH251> our brother אִתָּ֑נוּ <WH854> for נֵרְדָ֕ה <WH3381> with us we will go down וְנִשְׁבְּרָ֥ה <WH7666> and buy לְךָ֖ אֹֽכֶל׃ <WH400> thee food

וְאִם־ <WH518> if אֵינְךָ֥ <WH369> not מְשַׁלֵּ֖חַ <WH7971> But if thou wilt not send לֹ֣א <WH3808> we will not נֵרֵ֑ד <WH3381> [him] we will not go down כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָאִ֞ישׁ <WH376> for the man אָמַ֤ר <WH559> said אֵלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH413> about לֹֽא־ <WH3808> You will not תִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> unto us Ye shall not see פָנַ֔י <WH6440> my face בִּלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> unless אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <WH251> except your brother אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <WH854> for

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> And Israel לָמָ֥ה <WH4100> Why הֲרֵעֹתֶ֖ם <WH7489> Wherefore dealt ye [so] ill לִ֑י לְהַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> with me [as] to tell לָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> the man הַע֥וֹד <WH5750> still לָכֶ֖ם אָֽח׃ <WH251> they

וַיֹּאמְר֡וּ <WH559> And they said שָׁא֣וֹל <WH7592> asked שָֽׁאַל־ <WH7592> us straitly הָ֠אִישׁ <WH376> The man לָ֣נוּ וּלְמֽוֹלַדְתֵּ֜נוּ <WH4138> of our state and of our kindred לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying הַע֨וֹד <WH5750> still אֲבִיכֶ֥ם <WH1> [Is] your father חַי֙ <WH2416> age הֲיֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> there are לָכֶ֣ם אָ֔ח <WH251> your brother וַנַ֨גֶּד־ <WH5046> bewray ל֔וֹ עַל־ <WH5921> him according פִּ֖י <WH6310> to the tenor הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> of these words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> we הֲיָד֣וֹעַ <WH3045> could we certainly נֵדַ֔ע <WH3045> know כִּ֣י <WH3588> would יֹאמַ֔ר <WH559> that he would say הוֹרִ֖ידוּ <WH3381> down אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחִיכֶֽם׃ <WH251> your brother

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> And Judah אֶל־ <WH413> unto יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> unto Israel אָבִ֗יו <WH1> his father שִׁלְחָ֥ה <WH7971> Send הַנַּ֛עַר <WH5288> the lad אִתִּ֖י <WH854> and we וְנָק֣וּמָה <WH6965> with me and we will arise וְנֵלֵ֑כָה <WH1980> and go וְנִֽחְיֶה֙ <WH2421> that we may live וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and not נָמ֔וּת <WH4191> and not die גַּם־ <WH1571> well אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <WH587> we גַם־ <WH1571> well אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you גַּם־ <WH1571> well טַפֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH2945> both we and thou [and] also our little ones

אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> myself אֶֽעֶרְבֶ֔נּוּ <WH6148> I will be surety מִיָּדִ֖י <WH3027> for him of my hand תְּבַקְשֶׁ֑נּוּ <WH1245> shalt thou require אִם־ <WH518> him not לֹ֨א <WH3808> not הֲבִיאֹתִ֤יו <WH935> I bring אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> to you וְהִצַּגְתִּ֣יו <WH3322> unto thee and set לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> him before thee וְחָטָ֥אתִֽי <WH2398> then let me bear the blame לְךָ֖ כָּל־ <WH3605> for הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> for ever

כִּ֖י <WH3588> surely לוּלֵ֣א <WH3884> For except הִתְמַהְמָ֑הְנוּ <WH4102> we had lingered כִּֽי־ <WH3588> surely עַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> now שַׁ֖בְנוּ <WH7725> surely now we had returned זֶ֥ה <WH2088> he פַעֲמָֽיִם׃ <WH6471> this second time

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <WH413> about יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> Israel אֲבִיהֶ֗ם <WH1> And their father אִם־ <WH518> If כֵּ֣ן ׀ <WH3651> so אֵפוֹא֮ <WH645> unto them If [it must be] so now זֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise עֲשׂוּ֒ <WH6213> do קְח֞וּ <WH3947> this take מִזִּמְרַ֤ת <WH2173> of the best fruits הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> in the land בִּכְלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH3627> in your vessels וְהוֹרִ֥ידוּ <WH3381> and carry down לָאִ֖ישׁ <WH582> as מִנְחָ֑ה <WH4503> a present מְעַ֤ט <WH4592> a little צֳרִי֙ <WH6875> balm וּמְעַ֣ט <WH4592> and a little דְּבַ֔שׁ <WH1706> honey נְכֹ֣את <WH5219> spices וָלֹ֔ט <WH3910> and myrrh בָּטְנִ֖ים <WH992> nuts וּשְׁקֵדִֽים׃ <WH8247> and almonds

וְכֶ֥סֶף <WH3701> money מִשְׁנֶ֖ה <WH4932> double קְח֣וּ <WH3947> And take בְיֶדְכֶ֑ם <WH3027> in your hand וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֜סֶף <WH3701> and the money הַמּוּשָׁ֨ב <WH7725> that was brought again בְּפִ֤י <WH6310> in the mouth אַמְתְּחֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <WH572> of your sacks תָּשִׁ֣יבוּ <WH7725> carry [it] again בְיֶדְכֶ֔ם <WH3027> in your hand אוּלַ֥י <WH194> perhaps מִשְׁגֶּ֖ה <WH4870> peradventure it [was] an oversight הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he
וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲחִיכֶ֖ם <WH251> also your brother קָ֑חוּ <WH3947> Take וְק֖וּמוּ <WH6965> and arise שׁ֥וּבוּ <WH7725> go again אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> unto the man

וְאֵ֣ל <WH410> And God שַׁדַּ֗י <WH7706> Almighty יִתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> give לָכֶ֤ם רַחֲמִים֙ <WH7356> you mercy לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> the man וְשִׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> that he may send away לָכֶ֛ם אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <WH251> brother אַחֵ֖ר <WH312> your other וְאֶת־ <WH853> בִּנְיָמִ֑ין <WH1144> and Benjamin וַאֲנִ֕י <WH589> I כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> If שָׁכֹ֖לְתִּי <WH7921> I be bereaved שָׁכָֽלְתִּי׃ <WH7921> [of my children] I am bereaved

וַיִּקְח֤וּ <WH3947> took הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH376> the men אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּנְחָ֣ה <WH4503> present הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> that וּמִשְׁנֶה־ <WH4932> double כֶּ֛סֶף <WH3701> money לָקְח֥וּ <WH3947> and they took בְיָדָ֖ם <WH3027> in their hand וְאֶת־ <WH853> בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> and Benjamin וַיָּקֻ֙מוּ֙ <WH6965> and rose up וַיֵּרְד֣וּ <WH3381> and went down מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> to Egypt וַיַּֽעַמְד֖וּ <WH5975> and stood לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> Joseph

וַיַּ֨רְא <WH7200> saw יוֹסֵ֣ף <WH3130> And when Joseph אִתָּם֮ <WH854> with אֶת־ <WH853> בִּנְיָמִין֒ <WH1144> Benjamin וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> them he said לַֽאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after עַל־ <WH5921> unto בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> to the ruler of his house הָבֵ֥א <WH935> Bring אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH582> [these] men הַבָּ֑יְתָה <WH1004> home וּטְבֹ֤חַ <WH2873> and slay טֶ֙בַח֙ <WH2874> an animal וְהָכֵ֔ן <WH3559> and make ready כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִתִּ֛י <WH854> are to יֹאכְל֥וּ <WH398> shall dine הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH582> for [these] men בַּֽצָּהֳרָֽיִם׃ <WH6672> with me at noon

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> did הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> And the man כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after אָמַ֣ר <WH559> bade יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> as Joseph וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> brought הָאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> and the man אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> the men בֵּ֥יתָה <WH1004> house יוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> into Joseph's

וַיִּֽירְא֣וּ <WH3372> were afraid הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH376> now the men כִּ֣י <WH3588> because הֽוּבְאוּ֮ <WH935> because they were brought בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house יוֹסֵף֒ <WH3130> into Joseph's וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> and they said עַל־ <WH5921> against דְּבַ֤ר <WH1697> Because הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> of the money הַשָּׁ֤ב <WH7725> that was returned בְּאַמְתְּחֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH572> in our sacks בַּתְּחִלָּ֔ה <WH8462> at the first time אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <WH587> we מֽוּבָאִ֑ים <WH935> are we brought in לְהִתְגֹּלֵ֤ל <WH1556> that he may seek occasion עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5921> against וּלְהִתְנַפֵּ֣ל <WH5307> against us and fall עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> against וְלָקַ֧חַת <WH3947> upon us and take אֹתָ֛נוּ <WH853> לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> us for bondmen וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲמֹרֵֽינוּ׃ <WH2543> and our asses

וַֽיִּגְּשׁוּ֙ <WH5066> And they came near אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> to the steward אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after עַל־ <WH5921> and בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> of Joseph's וַיְדַבְּר֥וּ <WH1696> and they communed אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to him פֶּ֥תַח <WH6607> with him at the door הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> of the house

וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> And said בִּ֣י <WH994> O אֲדֹנִ֑י <WH113> sir יָרֹ֥ד <WH3381> we came indeed יָרַ֛דְנוּ <WH3381> down בַּתְּחִלָּ֖ה <WH8462> at the first time לִשְׁבָּר־ <WH7666> to buy אֹֽכֶל׃ <WH400> food

וַֽיְהִ֞י <WH1961> came כִּי־ <WH3588> when בָ֣אנוּ <WH935> And it came to pass when we came אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמָּל֗וֹן <WH4411> to the inn וַֽנִּפְתְּחָה֙ <WH6605> that we opened אֶת־ <WH853> אַמְתְּחֹתֵ֔ינוּ <WH572> our sacks וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and behold כֶֽסֶף־ <WH3701> money אִישׁ֙ <WH376> and behold [every] man's בְּפִ֣י <WH6310> [was] in the mouth אַמְתַּחְתּ֔וֹ <WH572> of his sack כַּסְפֵּ֖נוּ <WH3701> our money בְּמִשְׁקָל֑וֹ <WH4948> in full weight וַנָּ֥שֶׁב <WH7725> and we have brought it again אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בְּיָדֵֽנוּ׃ <WH3027> in our hand

וְכֶ֧סֶף <WH3701> money אַחֵ֛ר <WH312> And other הוֹרַ֥דְנוּ <WH3381> have we brought down בְיָדֵ֖נוּ <WH3027> in our hands לִשְׁבָּר־ <WH7666> to buy אֹ֑כֶל <WH400> food לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יָדַ֔עְנוּ <WH3045> we cannot tell מִי־ <WH4310> who שָׂ֥ם <WH7760> who put כַּסְפֵּ֖נוּ <WH3701> our money בְּאַמְתְּחֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH572> in our sacks

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> And he said שָׁל֨וֹם <WH7965> Peace לָכֶ֜ם אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֗אוּ <WH3372> [be] to you fear אֱלֹ֨הֵיכֶ֜ם <WH430> not your God וֵֽאלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> and the God אֲבִיכֶם֙ <WH1> of your father נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> hath given לָכֶ֤ם מַטְמוֹן֙ <WH4301> you treasure בְּאַמְתְּחֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH572> in your sacks כַּסְפְּכֶ֖ם <WH3701> your money בָּ֣א <WH935> I had אֵלָ֑י <WH413> then וַיּוֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> And he brought אֲלֵהֶ֖ם <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> שִׁמְעֽוֹן׃ <WH8095> Simeon

וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> brought הָאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> And the man אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> the men בֵּ֣יתָה <WH1004> house יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> into Joseph's וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> and gave מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> [them] water וַיִּרְחֲצ֣וּ <WH7364> and they washed רַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH7272> their feet וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and he gave מִסְפּ֖וֹא <WH4554> provender לַחֲמֹֽרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH2543> their asses

וַיָּכִ֙ינוּ֙ <WH3559> And they made ready אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> the present עַד־ <WH5704> against בּ֥וֹא <WH935> came יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> Joseph בַּֽצָּהֳרָ֑יִם <WH6672> at noon כִּ֣י <WH3588> for שָֽׁמְע֔וּ <WH8085> for they heard כִּי־ <WH3588> for שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there יֹ֥אכְלוּ <WH398> that they should eat לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> bread

וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> came יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> And when Joseph הַבַּ֔יְתָה <WH1004> home וַיָּבִ֥יאּוּ <WH935> they brought ל֛וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּנְחָ֥ה <WH4503> him the present אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בְּיָדָ֖ם <WH3027> which [was] in their hand הַבָּ֑יְתָה <WH1004> into the house וַיִּשְׁתַּחֲווּ־ <WH7812> and bowed ל֖וֹ אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> themselves to him to the earth

וַיִּשְׁאַ֤ל <WH7592> And he asked לָהֶם֙ לְשָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> them of [their] welfare וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said הֲשָׁל֛וֹם <WH7965> well אֲבִיכֶ֥ם <WH1> [Is] your father הַזָּקֵ֖ן <WH2205> the old man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> of whom אֲמַרְתֶּ֑ם <WH559> of whom ye spake הַעוֹדֶ֖נּוּ <WH5750> again חָֽי׃ <WH2416> age

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> And they answered שָׁל֛וֹם <WH7965> [is] in good health לְעַבְדְּךָ֥ <WH5650> Thy servant לְאָבִ֖ינוּ <WH1> our father עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <WH5750> is still חָ֑י <WH2416> he [is] yet alive וַֽיִּקְּד֖וּ <WH6915> And they bowed down their heads [וַיִּשְׁתַּחוּ כ] (וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוּֽוּ <WH7812> bow down ק)

וַיִּשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> And he lifted up עֵינָ֗יו <WH5869> his eyes וַיַּ֞רְא <WH7200> and saw אֶת־ <WH853> בִּנְיָמִ֣ין <WH1144> Benjamin אָחִיו֮ <WH251> his brother בֶּן־ <WH1121> son אִמּוֹ֒ <WH517> his mother's וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said הֲזֶה֙ <WH2088> is this אֲחִיכֶ֣ם <WH251> brother הַקָּטֹ֔ן <WH6996> [Is] this your younger אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> of whom אֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH559> of whom ye spake אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <WH559> unto me? And he said אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> God יָחְנְךָ֖ <WH2603> be gracious בְּנִֽי׃ <WH1121> unto thee my son

וַיְמַהֵ֣ר <WH4116> made haste יוֹסֵ֗ף <WH3130> And Joseph כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נִכְמְר֤וּ <WH3648> did yearn רַחֲמָיו֙ <WH7356> for his bowels אֶל־ <WH413> over אָחִ֔יו <WH251> upon his brother וַיְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> and he sought לִבְכּ֑וֹת <WH1058> [where] to weep וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> and he entered הַחַ֖דְרָה <WH2315> into [his] chamber וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ <WH1058> and wept שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> there

וַיִּרְחַ֥ץ <WH7364> And he washed פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> his face וַיֵּצֵ֑א <WH3318> and went out וַיִּ֨תְאַפַּ֔ק <WH662> and refrained וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> himself and said שִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> Set on לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> bread
